entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
